Usage imbued into a worn ikon or a body ikon

This badge of office proclaims your sovereignty. The imbued ikon gains the following ability.

Transcendenceâ€”Heavy is the Crown 2 (concentrate, mental, spirit, transcendence) The weight of authority falls heavily upon you, as well as nearby creatures. All enemies in a @Template[type:burst|distance:15] within 60 feet take spirit damage equal to your level with a @Check[will|against:class|basic] save against your class DC. Any enemy that fails its save must immediately kneel, dropping @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone] as a free action.
